thread.section_title: Pod 39 Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Urban
thread.title_full: Urban - Review of Pod 39 Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ria P
title: Urban
text: If you a youngster or young at heart, there is a place for you at the pod. Beautiful place and beautiful people. I felt young at heart here, lovely ambience and good people around. Room was quite small, but it was nice and clean besides for a place like that in the heart of Manhattan, it was the best it had to offer. Will definitely be back there whenever am in New York. Loved the roof top, my goodness what a view, it was priceless.
